name: Real Traffic Chase
description:
Buckle up, hit the gas and hold on tight; you’re in for the ride of the wildest chases. Take down runaway street racers while avoiding civilian cars as you chase and weave through traffic. Outrun high speed felons, outsmart rivals, outdrive buddy police and smash road in the most dangerous racing game Real Traffic Chase!

Real Traffic Chase is #1 action adventure intense 3D police pursuit racing game which tests your driving skills against street racers desperate to outrun you. Chicago Police driving is a fast action packed police car racing game which tests your highway police car driving and chasing skills against escaped criminal cars desperate to outrun your police car.

Features:
- Turn on the police siren
- 3D graphics
- Day and night road scenes
- Destroy enemies
- Endless traffic roads
